entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who lives in a cabin and has a dog named Fang. He is also referred to as 'half-giant'.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog that answers when they knock on the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the three people who went to visit Hagrid and his dog Fang.

relationships.description: Harry and his friends visited Hagrid's cabin.
Hagrid owns a dog named Fang.
